channel.title: Pk point shop problom
channel.description: I have one pk point shop and needed two so when i created the second its charging coins and pk points for the item. Can some one please help me out. I need it to charge only pk points.

item.title: Pk point shop problom
item.dc:creator: @batistaboy4 batistaboy4
item.description:
@batistaboy4 wrote:

Find the shop id in actionhandler.java and change it to charge only pkPoints

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point shop problom
item.dc:creator: @stefano1911 stefano1911
item.description:
@stefano1911 wrote:

jean,

when u start a topic give us more information.

is it a 317?
[Pi][Delta]
pictures say more then 1000 words

give us some code to work on.
tell us what u changed if u make 2 shops:

For example:
1: edgeville
2: varrock

just use the same npc? if u use other u have to change npc ids in client.java

Read full topic
